column5: AINT BEEN AROUND IN AGES SINCE TROUT ENDED AND WORK STARTED!!!! I MUST SAY WORKING FOR A LIVING STINKS  LOL JUST WANTED TO SAY HI (SINCE I FINALLY GOT A MIN ) AND GREAT TO SEE ALL THE REPORTS OF PEOPLE FISHIN!!! KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK OUT THERE!!!!

OHHH...............3 WEEKS OR MORE WITHOUT A STEELHEAD REPORT FROM YOU, AND YOU THINK WE HAVE FORGOTTEN ABOUT YOU??????????  NO!!!!!!!!!!!!  NOTICE THE CAPS,   :lol:  :lol:  :lol:  :lol:  :lol:   Be safe Scott, and report something fishing when you can.
Yes it was nice not to be shouted at for a little bit! LOL   Glad to hear your still alive... even though you insist on yelling at us.  Gerritt.
Scott we've been so busy reading Cliff and Carole's reports well we almost forgot about Ya  Good to see you working like the rest of us.  MTP
Glad to hear from you scott,well at least the trout are getting a well deserved break.  ...lol..lol.. ya you worked them over pretty good this past spring...well keep up the hard work .....cheers

Hey Scott,  Bly and I are already discussing the fall run...and hopefully getting into some salmon too!  I already bought a new noodle from from Tightlines, so I'm pretty much ready.  Good to hear from you again...and glad to see you still get to read the board from time to time.  Looking forward to fishing a trib or two with you in the fall.  Have a great summer...and dont be such a stranger around here!  Cliff
Good to see you back Scott  Maybe you will find time to fish, like carp on the pin like last year  Dave
Nice to hear from you Scott!  Hope all is well and that you will soon be able to sneak away and get into some fish!!  bly
